author: Breitbart News, Breitbart News
title: Sam Smith Changes 'To Die For' Album Title and Its Release Date over Coronavirus
description: March 30 (UPI) — Sam Smith will rename their forthcoming album, originally titled To Die For, and delay the album’s release.
content:
March 30 (UPI) Sam Smith will rename their forthcoming album, originally titled To Die For, and delay the albums release.
The 27-year-old singer announced in an Instagram post Monday that they are postponing their third studio album due to the coronavirus ou… [+1828 chars]
